TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TableRowGroupStructure extends System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.SemanticBasicElement implements class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableRowStructure>, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild

Docs.summary: Represents a set of one or more rows in a table.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A TableRowGroupStructure can only have a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableStructure> as a parent.
## Examples The following example shows the `<TableRowGroupStructure>` part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] document.
[!code-xml[DocumentStructure#DocStructTableStruct1](~/add/codesnippet/xaml/DocumentStructure/Content/FixedPage1_structure.xaml#docstructtablestruct1)]

Docs.summary: This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfx](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Adds a child object to the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableRowGroupStructure>.
Only <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableRowStructure> can be a child of <xref:System.Windows.Documents.DocumentStructures.TableRowGroupStructure> and there must be at least one child.

Docs.exception: is not one of the types that can be a child of this class. See **Remarks**.
